result.name: polyphagous-predator-database
result.notes: Results of field studies on the impact of the insecticide Dimethoate on populations of polyphagous predators in winter wheat fields in England.

organization.name: the-food-and-environment-research-agency
organization.title: The Food and Environment Research Agency

result.title: Polyphagous predator database

extras.value: Description and sample data given in: Walters, KFA; Morgan, D; Lane A; Ellis, SA (1998). The cumulative effect on populations of linyphiid spiders and carabid beetles of insecticide sprays applied to two consecutive winter wheat crops. In: Ecotoxicology: Pesticides and Beneficial organisms, PT Haskell and P McEwen (eds.), Kluwer Academic Publishers, 287-291.
